law.text: The State Office of Financial Management shall prepare and submit to the Legislative Research Commission a report by July 30 of each year on the operational and financial status of the fund.
law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 46, sec. 11, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 321,sec. 7, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 3, effective February 19, 1988. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 262, sec. 7, effective April 3, 1986.
